survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer behaviors and preferences related to sustainable grocery shopping practices.

questions.question_text: How often do you prioritize purchasing sustainably sourced groceries?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for better data granularity. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How often do you prioritize purchasing sustainably sourced groceries?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable practices do you actively seek when grocery shopping? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question. Include 'None of the above' to capture non-participants.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainable practices do you actively seek when grocery shopping? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors most influence your decision to purchase sustainable groceries?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' open-text option for additional insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Radio buttons with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What factors most influence your decision to purchase sustainable groceries?

questions.question_text: How much more are you willing to pay for sustainably sourced groceries compared to conventional options?
questions.client_notes: Use percentage ranges for clarity. Consider follow-up questions for high-value respondents.

script.question_text: How much more are you willing to pay for sustainably sourced groceries compared to conventional options?

questions.question_text: Which grocery stores or brands do you associate with strong sustainability practices?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture brand associations. Limit response length to 200 characters.

script.question_text: Which grocery stores or brands do you associate with strong sustainability practices?

questions.question_text: How important is it for grocery stores to offer recycling or composting options in-store?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale to measure importance. Randomize order if possible.

script.question_text: How important is it for grocery stores to offer recycling or composting options in-store?

questions.question_text: Do you actively participate in any of the following sustainable grocery shopping programs? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to assess program participation.

script.question_text: Do you actively participate in any of the following sustainable grocery shopping programs? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What barriers prevent you from purchasing more sustainable groceries?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' open-text option for additional barriers.
questions.scripter_notes: Checkboxes with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What barriers prevent you from purchasing more sustainable groceries?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current availability of sustainable grocery options in your area?
questions.client_notes: 5-point satisfaction scale. Follow up with dissatisfied respondents if possible.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current availability of sustainable grocery options in your area?

questions.question_text: What additional sustainable grocery practices would you like to see implemented?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture innovative ideas. Limit response length to 300 characters.

script.question_text: What additional sustainable grocery practices would you like to see implemented?
